alert.note: Alert for Grand (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 13 at 7:55PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of north central Colorado, including the following county, the East Troublesome burn area in northern Grand. * WHEN...Until 915 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 752 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause small stream flooding. - Additional rainfall amounts of 0.2 to 0.3 inches are expected over the area in the next hour. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly East Troublesome burn area in Northern Grand County
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Heavy Rainfall will cause minor flooding of small creeks, streams, and ditches in the East Troublesome burn area. The heavy rains could also trigger rock slides or debris flows.
